ef_phantom.title: Phantom
ef_phantom.description:
Teleport in a specified direction.Dodge all dodgeable attacks
Cost : 4 stamina

ef_ender_step.title: Ender Step
ef_ender_step.description:
A fast teleportation away from danger.While executing this skill, you become immune to physical attacks
Cost : 4 stamina

ef_wolf_god_leap.title: Wolf God Leap
ef_wolf_god_leap.description:
You can use different actions to dodge.
A successful dodge can trigger special effects and restore weapon charge.

Cost : 4 Stamina

ef_dodge_master.title: Dodge Master
ef_dodge_master.description:
Instincly dodge a small distance if you would take damage after the cast within a window of 0.30s.
Continuously dodge all attack after the first one within a window of 0.50s and after each successful dodge.
Double stamina consumption on multiple successive casts.

Cost : 4 Stamina

ef_stellar_restoration.title: Stellar Restoration
ef_stellar_restoration.description:
Throw a sword in the direction you are looking. Casting this skill again allows you to teleport to the sword's position, and execute a sweeping attack upon arrival.

Cost : 5 Stamina

ef_precise_roll.title: Precise Roll
ef_precise_roll.description:
Roll in the direction you are moving.
Evade all incoming attacks during the roll.

Cost : 4 Stamina

ef_better_step.title: Better Step
ef_better_step.description:
Slide a short distance in the direction you are moving.
Evade all incoming attacks during the slide.

Cost : 3 Stamina

ef_ravager_force.title: Ravager Force
ef_ravager_force.description:
Charge forward, pushing away any entity that come across your path.
You are immune tu stun effect during the charge and take 40% less damage

Cost : 8 Stamina

ef_punishment_kick.title: Punishment Kick
ef_punishment_kick.description:
Kick in front of you with force.
Causes strong stun, and can blackout if performed during enemy attack.

Cost : 8 Stamina
Cooldown : 3s

ef_ender_obscuris.title: Ender Obscuris
ef_ender_obscuris.description:
Teleport you behind the last hitted target within a 30 blocks radius from your position.
While executing this skill, you become immune to physical attacks.

Cost : 7 Stamina

ef_shadow_step.title: Shadow Step
ef_shadow_step.description:
Disappear in the shadows, twisting space itself to move quickly in the direction you are moving for a brief moment.
While executing this skill, you become immune to physical attacks

Cost : 7 Stamina

ef_time_travel.title: Time Travel
ef_time_travel.description:
Mark your current position and health. After 5 seconds or when you cast this skill again, teleport you back to the marked position, healing half of the damage you took during the skill.
You can cancel the teleportation effect by sneaking.

Cost : 8 Stamina
Cooldown : 3s

ef_parrying.title: Parrying
ef_parrying.description:
Right-click to guard against frontal attacks. When you successfully guard yourself just before being hit, the stamina cost will be nullified.

Continued guarding will consume more stamina, and the stamina consumed depends on the impact of the attack blocked.

ef_vengeful_parry.title: Vengeful Parry
ef_vengeful_parry.description:
Right-click to enter a guarding stance for 2 seconds. You will hold your position during that time, blocking all incoming attacks at no stamina cost. Afterwards, your next attack will be empowered with the damage blocked with that skill.

This skill can only be used with the following weapon types : axe, uchigatana, rapier, sword, spear, longsword, greatsword, tachi.

Continued guarding will consume more stamina, and the stamina consumed depends on the impact of the attack blocked.

ef_counter_attack.title: Counter Attack
ef_counter_attack.description:
Right-click to guard against frontal attacks. When you successfully guard yourself just before being hit, you will execute a counter attack based on the weapon you are holding.

This skill can only be used with the following weapon types : greatsword, uchigatana, longsword, sword, tachi, spear, agony, ruine.

Continued guarding will consume more stamina, and the stamina consumed depends on the impact of the attack blocked.

ef_rain_screen.title: Rain Screen
ef_rain_screen.description:
Right-click to kick away all nearby enemies, and summon 4 swords around you for 10 seconds. These swords can guard against all attacks, and breaks upon blocking an instance of damage.
Whenever a sword breaks, you consume 3 stamina to heal yourself.

Cooldown : 22s

ef_impact_guard.title: Impact Guard
ef_impact_guard.description:
Right-click to guard against frontal attacks. You can guard against explosion, fire, magic and projectiles with 80% efficiency.

This skill can only be used with the following weapon types : greatsword, longsword, sword, tachi, spear.

Continued guarding will consume more stamina, and the stamina consumed depends on the impact of the attack blocked.

ef_perfect_bulwark.title: Perfect Bulwark
ef_perfect_bulwark.description:
Right-click to guard against attacks from all direction. Releasing your guard after being hit 5 times will create a shockwave around you that pushes enemies away.

This skill can only be used with the following weapon types : uchigatana, longsword, sword, tachi, spear, agony, ruine, staff.

This skill will progressively use more and more stamina for each attack blocked, and the stamina consumed depends on the impact of the attack blocked. The cooldown is equal to the number of hit blocked in seconds.

ef_shulker_cloak.title: Shulker Cloak
ef_shulker_cloak.description:
You lose the ability to guard, and your stamina regeneration is impaired. Instead, you gain one level of shulker resistance every 5 seconds. If you have at least 1 level of shulker resistance when taking damage, you consumme a level to reduce that instance of damage by 60%

-50% Stamina Regeneration

ef_soul_protection.title: Soul Protection
ef_soul_protection.description:
You lose the ability to guard, and your stamina regeneration is impaired. Instead, you summon a soul every second, which gives you 1% of damage negation. Your own soul gives you 20% damage negation instead. Getting damaged will remove 3 souls.

-50% Stamina Regeneration

ef_berserker.title: Berserker
ef_berserker.description:
You gain 0.5% additional attack damage and 0.3% additional attack speed for each 1% of missing health.
The additional attacks speed obtained by this effect cannot exceed 5.0.

+6 Stamina

ef_death_harvest.title: Death Harvest
ef_death_harvest.description:
You regain your innate weapon charge upon killing an enemy with it.

+15% Melee Damage

ef_critical_knowledge.title: Critical Knowledge
ef_critical_knowledge.description:
You have 20% chance to deal 60% more damage.
The chance of activating this effects increases by 5% for each level of Fire Protection you have on your armor, while the damage of the effect is increased by 15% for each level of Blast Protection.
This effect is independant from the usual Critical Hit, and can stack with it.

ef_latent_retribution.title: Latent Retribution
ef_latent_retribution.description: If you do not perform a combat action (attack, dodge or block) for 4 seconds, you gain "Retribution". This will grant you stun immunity and boost the damage of your attacks by 40% once you start attacking, and for the next 4 seconds.

ef_emergency_escape.title: Emergency Escape
ef_emergency_escape.description:
You can dodge once even if you don't have enough stamina. Furthermore, you can cancel your own attack motion by performing a dodge.

This passive can only be used with the following weapon types : uchigatana, sword, dagger.

Cooldown : 15s
+30% Stamina Regen

ef_technician.title: Technician
ef_technician.description:
Upon executing a perfect dodge, which is triggered whenever you dodge an attack just before it hits you, you regain the Stamina spent on your dodge.

+40% Stamina Regen

ef_stamina_pillager.title: Stamina Pillager
ef_stamina_pillager.description:
You regain 30% of your missing stamina whenever you kill someone.

+3 Stamina
+10% Attack Damage

ef_mindset.title: Mindset
ef_mindset.description: You gain "Mindset" while you have more than 80% of your max health. This will increase the damage of your attacks by 30% and reduce any damage you receive by 20%.

ef_hyper_vitality.title: Hyper Vitality
ef_hyper_vitality.description:
You can use your stamina instead of your weapon charge when it is not full.
The stamina cost depends on the weapon used

Cooldown : 6s
+2 Heart
+2 Stamina

ef_adrenaline.title: Adrenaline
ef_adrenaline.description: You gain "Adrenaline" while you have less than 20% of your max health. This will increase the damage of your attacks by 60% and reduce any damage you receive by 40%.

ef_arrow_tenacity.title: Arrow Tenacity
ef_arrow_tenacity.description: You cannot suffer stun from arrow damage.

ef_pain_anticipation.title: Pain Anticipation
ef_pain_anticipation.description: If you do not perform a combat action (attack, dodge or block) for 2 seconds, you gain "Anticipation". This will grant you stun immunity and reduce the damage you receive by 40% once you are attacked, and for the next 2 seconds.

ef_heart_shield.title: Heart Shield
ef_heart_shield.description:
You gain 10 permanent absorption hearts that regenerate over time if you do not perform a combat action (attack, dodge or block) for 2 seconds, at a rate of 1 every 4 seconds.
The recovery speed of those heart is increased for each level of Protection enchantment on your armor.

ef_meditation.title: Meditation
ef_meditation.description:
You can sneak for 2 seconds without moving to enter a state of meditation. The longer you maintain this state, the better the benefits will be. There are 3 stages of meditation, each giving different effects
Stage 1 : +40% Damage Dealt
Stage 2 : +30% Attack Speed and permanent speed 1
Stage 3 : 50% Damage Reduction and permanent regeneration 1

ef_dancing_blade.title: Dancing Blade
ef_dancing_blade.description: Every 4th successfull attack you make will have it's damage increased by 80%

ef_forbidden_strength.title: Forbidden Strength
ef_forbidden_strength.description:
You will consume your own health instead of your stamina when you don't have enough to execute an action.

+5% Attack Damage
+2 Heart
